LFD.domain.mediator

Interface LFDModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LFDModelManager

    public interface LFDModel
    The Interface to the facade of the Domain Model
    See Also:
    LFDModelManager

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        void apply(int announcementNumber,
           UserInfo user)
        Method used to add a user to a specific announcement's list of applied users
        Parameters:
        announcementNumber - Used to specify which announcement the user wants to apply to
        user - Holds the information of the user @see UserInfo

      • getAllAnnouncements

        AnnouncementList getAllAnnouncements()
        Method that returns the AnnouncementList from the model
        Returns:
        List that contains all the published announcements
        See Also:
        AnnouncementList

      • registerUser

        void registerUser(UserInfo userInfo,
                  java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password)
        Method that uses the Persistence Interface to register a user
        Parameters:
        userInfo - The user's information stored in a UserInfo class
        username - The username chosen by the user stored only in the Persistence
        password - The password chosen by the user stored only in the Persistence
        See Also:
        LFDPersistence

        password - The password entered by the user
        Returns:
        See Also:
